synopsis.text:
Zestiria, a land of harmony maintained by the mystical Seraphim, is the setting for an upcoming anime special based on Bandai Namco Games' popular role-playing game, Tales of Zestiria. The anime is slated to premiere before the game's release, as announced at the Tales of Festival 2014 event.

At the heart of the story is Sorey, a human boy chosen by the Seraphim and bestowed with extraordinary powers. His life takes a dramatic turn when he crosses paths with Alisha and Lunarre, propelling him on a transformative journey. As he navigates through uncharted territories, Sorey's ultimate destiny unfolds: to become the Shepherd and safeguard the world from impending doom.

This captivating anime special promises to immerse viewers in a world of enchanting spirits and courageous heroes, as they embark on a thrilling adventure to restore balance and harmony to the land of Zestiria.
